description: Contracts for the sponsorship and running of the London Cycle HIre Scheme

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["This page includes the sponsorship contract with Santander and the scheme agreement which is the contract with Serco for provision of the service."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Santander Cycles"}
Santander is sponsoring our cycle hire scheme for seven years from 2015.

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"Santander Cycles - cycle hire scheme sponsorship","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/cycle-hire-sponsorship-contract.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 1.18MB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"London Cycle Hire Scheme Agreement"}
The London Cycle Hire Scheme Agreement is the contract between Transport Trading Ltd and Serco Ltd to provide the London Cycle Hire Scheme services from July 2010.
The following contractual documents have had part, or all, of their content modified for reasons of commercial interest or commercial confidentiality.

London Cycle Hire Scheme Agreement - Redacted Version (PDF 1.3MB)
